question: The Nobel Prize in Physics 2016 was awarded to David J. Thouless, F. Duncan Haldane and J. Michael Kosterlitz for the:
option2: theoretical discoveries of topological phase transitions and topological phases of matter
option3: invention of efficient blue light-emitting diodes which has enabled bright and energy
option4: theory of how particles acquire mass
answer: theoretical discoveries of topological phase transitions and topological phases of matter
explanation: The Nobel Prize in Physics 2016 was awarded to David J. Thouless, F. Duncan Haldane and J. Michael Kosterlitz for the theoretical discoveries of topological phase transitions and topological phases of matter.
